titleStmt.title: Charles, by the grace of God, King of England, Scotland, France and Ireland, defender of the faith, &c., to all to whom these presents shall come greeting whereas wee by our commission vnder our great seale of England ... haue giuen power and authoritie vnto our commissioners therein named ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: Grant for life to P. Craford and M. Birkenhead of the office of clerk for writing passports.
"Witnesse Our selfe at Canbury, the five and twentieth day of May, in the sixth yeare of our Reigne."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
